document_data.caption: A map showing Gold Street in central Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Gold Street
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Gold Street''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] in central Zhentil Keep, Gold Street branched west from [[Raven Street]] near the center of the quarter and passed northeast to terminate at the wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. Gold Street crossed [[Flostren's Memory]] and [[the Dark Road]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The residences of Lord [[Ssorg]] and Magistrate [[Osconivon]] were located on Gold Street. The [[High Hall (Zhentil Keep)|High Hall]] and [[Detention Center]] sat on the eastern end of Gold Street. The [[Zhentilar]] maintaned a barracks and armory on Gold Street.
